name: Darktalon Treilla
title: Void Revenant
abilityText: Each token in your fleet supply increases the maximum number if non-fighter ships you can have in each system by 2 instead of 1.

name: 2RAM
title: Integrated Systems Engineer
abilityText: Your dreadnaughts and flagship ignore anomalies movement restrictions, and gain +1 movement while moving to or through an anomaly.
unlockCondition: Win a space combat in or adjacent to an anomaly, where one of your dreadnaughts participated and survived.

name: Brother Milor
title: Pruified by Fire
abilityText: During the announce retreat step of combat: You may exhaust this agent and choose a player participating in the combat. That player cannot retreat.

name: Sai Seravus
title: Gatewarden
abilityText: After your ships move: For each ship that has a capacity value and moved through 1 or more wormholes, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements in the active system.

name: It Feeds on Carrion
title: Twisted Horror
abilityText: ACTION: Each other player rolls a die for each of their non-fighter ships that are in or adjacent to a system that contains a gravity rift; on a 1-3 capture that unit. If this causes a player's ground forces or fighters to be removed, also capture those units. Then, purge this card
